appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store. Must be less than 132 characters.
appDesc.message: O HelloFax facilita a assinatura de documentos e envio de faxes on-line. Você nunca mais precisará imprimir, assinar e digitalizar documentos novamente!

appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store. Must be less than 45 characters.

appShortName.description: The short title of the application, displayed in the web store. Must be less than 12 characters.
